articles.description: The new features for the Pixel have just been released and they include one standout extra which Apple users would love.
articles.content:
Google Pixel has new features
David Phelan
Google likes to make sure its Pixel phones stay cutting edge by releasing a load of new features every three months in whats come to be known as the Pixel… [+4016 chars]
